first_para: David Linsay Willetts (born 9 March 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician and was the Minister of State for Universities and Science until the July 2014 cabinet reshuffle. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) representing the constituency of Havant in Hampshire.

full.extract: David Linsay Willetts (born 9 March 1956) is a British Conservative Party politician and was the Minister of State for Universities and Science until the July 2014 cabinet reshuffle. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) representing the constituency of Havant in Hampshire.
full.title: David Willetts
